import React, {useState} from 'react'; const Bookshelf = ({section, books})=> { const [selection, setSection] = useState(''); const handleSectionChange = (event) => { setSection(event.target.value); }; return

{section}

    {books.map((book)=> (
  1. {book.bookTitle}
    {book.bookAuthors}
    2. ))}
} export default Bookshelf;
